types.type:
<prop opt type="Object. (string|Middleware)[]>" name="middlewareConfig"> The method-level middleware configuration: for each method it specifies how to construct the middleware chain. If the string is found in the chain, the middleware will be looked up in the `middleware` object.
<prop opt name="middleware" type="Object."> The configured middleware object return by the Idio's `start` method.
The filter for filenames. Defaults to importing JS and JSX.
<prop opt name="aliases" type="Object."> The map of aliases. Aliases can also be specified in routes by exporting the `aliases` property.
